August 2024

My Old Ass

Hollywood Forever 6000 Santa Monica Blvd

Los Angeles, CA 90038 United States+ Google Map

Free

Directed by Megan Park (2024) Gates at 6:45pm / Show at 8:30pm Cinespia and Amazon MGM Studios invite you to a special FREE advanced screening of My Old Ass, the heartfelt and hilarious instant classic. Life’s a trip when spirited Elliott’s 18th-birthday ‘shroomin’ spree causes past and present to collide. Will advice from the future
